title: ICE OUT OF PORTLAND! REVOKE THE ICE PERMIT!
description: Join us to protest ICE's violation of the conditional use permit. We are rallying to demand the Portland Permitting and Development Office revokes the permit.
raw_text:
Rally outside Portland Permitting & Development Office
ICE OUT OF PORTLAND! REVOKE THE ICE PERMIT!

Thursday, August 28th ‚Äì 4:30 pm
1900 SW 4th Ave, Portland, OR

ICE has violated the conditional use permit for its facility on Macadam. Join us as we rally outside the Portland Permitting and Development Office to demand they cite the facility and revoke the permit!
raw_summary: The image announces a rally outside the Portland Permitting and Development Office. The event is planned to protest ICE's violation of a conditional use permit. The rally aims to demand the permit be revoked.

title: Labor Day 2025 Event
description: Join us to raise awareness against a bill associated with Lauren Boebert that impacts health insurance, food stamp benefits, and increases national debt.
raw_text: LABOR DAY 2025 Aug 29th WORKERS OVER BILLIONAIRES Time Friday, August 29 5 ‚Äì 7pm MDT Location 4th and Lincoln E 4th St Loveland, CO 80537 Map About this event Get out the word: Boebert sides with billionaires, not with you! Lauren Boebert cast an enthusiastic YES for the GOP's Big Ugly Bill that will - kick 12 million Americans off of their health insurance - reduce food stamp benefits for thousands of working families - create the single largest increase in the national debt in history - give over $5 Billion in handouts to out-of-state billionaires No wonder, the bill is wildly unpopular among Americans of both parties. Yet over the past month, Republican support for the bill increased by 17% in the face of misleading statements and partisan propaganda. We need to get out the word to Boebert's constituents and make sure they understand the truth about this bill. Boebert stands with billionaires, not with us.
raw_summary: The flyer is for a Labor Day event on August 29th, 2025, organized by "Workers Over Billionaires." It promotes awareness against a bill associated with Lauren Boebert.

title: Share Your Voices for Working Families
description: Join us for a Labor Day rally to express your views on working and living in America. Be a musician, poet, or labor speaker and share your voice.
raw_text:
SHARE YOUR VOICES FOR WORKING FAMILIES
#WorkersOverBillionaires

MON, SEPT. 1, 2025
Labor Day rally 6:00-7:30 PM
HISTORIC COURTHOUSE, 199 N Main, LOGAN, UTAH

Be a musician, poet, or labor speaker
Express your views on working and living in today's America

We the People Cache Valley
SIGN UP: ATTEND
INDIVISIBLE OF CACHE VALLEY

SIGN UP HERE TO SING, SPEAK, READ POETRY, OR PERFORM
Revive Democracy ‚Äì Fairness, Freedom, Equal Rights, Justice, Restore Earth

A core principle behind all our INDIVISIBLE events is a commitment to nonviolent action. We expect all participants to seek to de-escalate any potential confrontation with those who disagree with our values. Weapons of any kind, including those legally permitted, should not be brought to events.
If there are too many volunteers, we may request that you present at a future event.
raw_summary: The image announces a Labor Day rally event themed "Share Your Voices for Working Families" to be held on September 1, 2025, at the Historic Courthouse, 199 N Main, Logan, Utah. The event invites musicians, poets, and labor speakers to express their views on working and living in America. It is organized by "We the People Cache Valley" and "Indivisible of Cache Valley." There are also QR codes for sign-up, emphasizing nonviolent participation.

title: We Are Over It
description: Join us for a peaceful protest called 'We Are Over It,' where we unite to express our dissatisfaction with political issues through overpass bannering. This Labor Day, let your voice be heard across the nation.
raw_text:
WE ARE OVER IT
WHEN: Labor Day 9/1
WHERE: An overpass near you
WHAT: Overpass Bannering
WHO: We the people
WHY:
We‚Äôre over the kidnappings.
We‚Äôre over the corruption.
We‚Äôre over the gaslighting.
We‚Äôre over the destruction of our Constitution.
SEPTEMBER 1, 2025 ‚Ä¢ WE‚ÄôRE #OVERIT
We are committed to peaceful protest.
While bannering, please do not leave banners unattended or hang banners over bridge rails.
Please be considerate of pedestrians + don‚Äôt feed the trolls.
EVERGREEN RESISTANCE
YOU ARE THE RESISTANCE
raw_summary: This flyer is promoting an event called "We Are Over It," involving overpass bannering on Labor Day, September 1, 2025. It encourages participants to express dissatisfaction over political issues. The event is organized by "We the people" and takes place at various locations on overpasses nationwide.

title: Labor Day March
description: Join 50501 NNV for a silent march in support and solidarity for workers and families who have gone missing due to unlawful ICE activities. Wear black and receive a yellow mask at the event to symbolize support.
raw_text:
LETS MARCH ON
LABOR DAY
SEPTEMBER 1, 2025
MEET 10AM AT CITY PLAZA
(30 NORTH VIRGINIA ST, RENO, NV)

Support Workers Over Billionaires

JOIN 50501 NNV FOR A SILENT MARCH IN SUPPORT AND SOLIDARITY FOR WORKERS AND FAMILIES WHO HAVE GONE MISSING DUE TO UNLAWFUL ICE ACTIVITIES.

ALL SIGNS WILL BE PROVIDED AT THE EVENT. WE ASK THAT YOU WEAR ALL BLACK TO SYMBOLIZE THE VOID LEFT BY THOSE WHO ARE MISSING. WE WILL BE PROVIDING YELLOW FACE MASKS TO WEAR IN SUPPORT OF THE FAMILIES OF THOSE WHO ARE MISSING.

https://linktr.ee/50501nnv
